mainSubject: Technical issues with sensor and dongle
painPoints: Tracking issues persist in wired mode
Dongle completely non-functional on first unit
High price point ($150) for problematic product
improvementSuggestions: Fix sensor tracking reliability at high polling rates
Improve dongle functionality and quality control
Better quality control to prevent DOA units

positives: Product has no flaws in user's opinion
Good for those who love the product
painPoints: Poor value proposition compared to competitors
improvementSuggestions: Reduce price to better match value proposition
Improve features to justify premium pricing
